public_description: Choose dress that is not like others in style

public_instructions:
Look at the images of dresses. 7 out of 8 dresses have the same style. And only one dress has a different style. You have to choose it.
Style means shape, design, tailoring. But not color. There is no need to look into the details.

Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up markup.

Often all the extra dress stands out obviously. If this is not the case, choose the one that you think is the most different in style.

Examples

  • All dresses are sleeveless and only one with sleeves - it is superfluous
  • All dresses with long sleeves and only one with short sleeves - it is superfluous
  • All dresses are light and long and only one - a sweater dress - is superfluous
